content.title: From bean to cup, we’ve got you covered!
content.description: Bean has two locations: one in Roxas City and one in Iloilo City. The store is owned by a young entrepreneur named Martin Fajardo II.
content.mission: To serve premium coffee made from the finest beans, creating a welcoming environment where every cup brings people together with quality and passion.
content.vision: To be the go-to destination for coffee lovers, offering an exceptional experience while promoting sustainability and community connection.

items.name: Sakura Latte
items.description: Florance essence of cherry blossom flavors perfectly crafted.

items.name: Caramel Macchiato
items.description: The famous espresso drink blended with caramel and vanilla.

items.name: Dirty Matcha
items.description: A blend of matcha and espresso.

items.name: Carrot Cake
items.description: Sweet carrots, warm spice, luscious cream cheese frosting.

items.name: Blueberry Cheesecake
items.description: Creamy cheesecake, fresh blueberries, buttery graham crust.

items.name: Bean There Umbrella
items.description: Stylish and durable umbrellas branded with Bean There Coffee.

items.name: Bean There Tumbler
items.description: Reusable tumbler perfect for coffee lovers.

items.title: A Hidden Gem!
items.review: I absolutely love Bean There! From the moment I walk in, I'm greeted with the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee...
items.author: Felmar Sion

items.title: My Go-To Coffee Spot!
items.review: Bean There has quickly become my favorite place to get coffee. I love how they customize drinks to your preferences...
items.author: Vonn Villano

footer.description: At Bean There, we’re passionate about more than just coffee – we’re all about creating a welcoming space where every cup brings comfort and joy...
